name: com.argis.library
description:
*NOTE* You must already have the dependencies before adding this package in order for it to compile properly.

This is a library which includes all the necessary namespaces required to connect to the Argis Rest API.

You will need BestHTTP/2 which can be purchased from the asset store.

samples.description: Sample on how to Log into  and use the Argis API
Sample on how to create a serialized dictionary
Sample on how to add threading
